/>
VIII.iii.2.A.1.b
.
Action to Take When a Positive Tuberculin Reaction and Other Disabilities Are Claimed
If a positive tuberculin reaction is claimed together with other disabilities,
complete any appropriate development required for the other disabilities, and
refer the claim to the rating activity for rating of all the claimed disabilities.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A - Developing Claims for Service Connection (SC) for Positive Tuberculin Reactions
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A
